GRAMMAR TOPICS
 
1. Parts of Speech
- Nouns, verbs, adjectives, adverbs, pronouns, prepositions, conjunctions, interjections
 
2. Sentence Structure
- Simple, compound, complex, compound-complex sentences
- Independent and dependent clauses
 
3. Punctuation
- Commas, semicolons, colons, quotation marks, apostrophes
 
4. Subject-Verb Agreement
- Singular vs. plural subjects and verbs
 
5. Verb Tenses
- Present, past, future, and perfect forms
 
6. Pronoun Usage
- Pronoun-antecedent agreement and case (subjective, objective, possessive)
 
7. Clauses and Phrases
- Noun, adjective, and adverb clauses; prepositional and participial phrases
 
8. Parallel Structure
- Consistent grammatical patterns in writing
 
9. Sentence Fragments and Run-ons
- Identifying and correcting incomplete or overly long sentences
 
10. Active and Passive Voice
- Choosing appropriate tone and clarity
 
11. Common Errors
- Misplaced modifiers, double negatives, homophones
 
12. Mechanics
- Capitalization, spelling, and standard usage
